title: purposes of section 98(6) of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Health and Social Care Professionals Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 

2005 (Special measures registration having regard to Covid-19) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited health social care professional act 2005 (special measure registration regard covid-19) order 2021

title: purposes of section 98(6) of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005.
heading: 2. The 31st of December 2021 is specified as the different date for the
text_raw:
2. The 31st of December 2021 is specified as the different date for the 
purposes of section 98(6) of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 June, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [299] 3
text_norm: 2 31st december 2021 specified different date purpose section 98(6) health social care professional act 2005 given official seal 24 june 2021 stephen donnelly minister health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 29th june 2021 299 3

title: purposes of section 98(6) of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order specifies 31 December 2021 as the date on which a Section 98 
registration still in force shall cease to have effect. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [299]
